attributes.action: put Lucie Jones back on the x factor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a friend of Simon Cowell and, as someone who has confessed to how bad John and Edward are, we're asking you to support our petition. We want Lucie Jones back on the show as a truly talented Welsh performer.  Have a word with Simon for the sake of Saturday night television in Number 10 and homes across Wales and the UK.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
